summary: This makes all Daedric weapon instant kill!
descriptionHtml:
This makes all Daedric weapon instant kill (1000 Damage), it will take 1 click of any Daedric weapon to kill anyone, to kill a dragon takes 1-2. 

I have also made the Daedric Armor very good and given it enchanted stuff by default (Can\'t remember what it is enchanted but something about Magika)

Install:
Just download and place in your data folder! 
When you run Skyrim select Data Files and make sure it is checked.

I find this mod makes the game really fun when getting a long range Daedric bow kill and it does make it far more realistic.
author: James Kingsley
